bug.author: kepsail
bug.summary: cannot sort by Default metric in the Trial jobs tab
bug.description: In the Trial jobs tab, when I click the (sort by) Default metric button, the results are always sorted by the column Trial No.

comments.comment: In Edge, the results are actually sorted by Trial No. In Chrome, the results are confused.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/kepsail>@kepsail</denchmark-link> Thanks for reporting this bug. I'll fix it soon.

In Edge, the results are actually sorted by Trial No. In Chrome, the results are confused.
The results are not sorted by Trial No. when you sorted by default metric column. Because webui sorted default metric column by trial's final metric but some trial hadn't final metric. It caused the confuse. I'll sort default metric by final/Iatest intermediate metric.
